pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy | Protection of your personal data Back Office About Price Blogs Order Privacy Policy for Back Office Welcome to Back Office! Protecting your privacy is our top priority, and this Privacy Policy outlines our practices for collecting, using, and safeguarding your personal data. 1. Data Collection: - At Back Office, we gather various personal information, such as your name, email address, and contact number, when you interact with our services, such as making a reservation or subscribing to our newsletter. - Additionally, we automatically collect non-personal data like IP addresses, browser types, and device identifiers to improve the functionality and user experience of our website. 2. Use of Data: - Your personal data is primarily used for processing reservations, providing customer support, and sharing information about our products and services. - Non-personal data is utilized for analytical purposes, such as monitoring website traffic patterns and refining our marketing strategies. 3. Data Sharing: - We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your data with trusted partners and service providers who assist us in delivering our services and enhancing customer experience. 4. Data Security: - Back Office implements industry-standard security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. 5. Your Choices: - You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal data stored in our systems. Additionally, you may opt out of receiving marketing communications from us at any time. 6. Policy Updates: - We reserve the right to amend or revise this Privacy Policy as needed. Any changes will be promptly communicated to you through our website or other appropriate channels. If you have any questions or concerns regarding our Privacy Policy, please don't hesitate to contact us at backoffice@gmail.com. Thank you for entrusting Back Office with your privacy and choosing us to cater to your needs! Last Updated: April 2024 backoffice@gmail.com +91-532-6426445 Privacy Policy Terms of Use 42XW+R2C, Bharatnagar, Nagpur, Maharashtra 440001, India Copyright @ 2024 Back Office, all rights reserved
